amendment.description: Amendment sought to decrease the authorization for prison grants by $2.5 billion.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (printed as amendment No. 36 in the Congressional Record of February 9, 1995) to decrease the authorization in the bill for prison grants by $2.5 billion, from $10.5 billion over five years to $8 billion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 155 - 268 (Roll no. 115).
